definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: The picture was recorded from an Alpine mountain pass not far from Turin, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是在离意大利都灵不远的一条山道上拍摄的。

sentences.english: Mr. Calvino enrolled at the University of Turin, intending to study agronomy.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔维诺先生进入了都灵大学学习农学。

sentences.english: This was the first historical draw of the Veneti in Turin.
sentences.chinese: 这是双方在都灵交锋上的第一次平局。

sentences.english: At an additional points, cost Balin can replace his two-handed axe with Durin's Axe.
sentences.chinese: 可以支付额外费用，将巴林双手斧换成都灵之斧来用。

sentences.english: The man from Turin returned to his hometown after being released from hospital.
sentences.chinese: 这名来自都灵的男子不久就从医院返回家中。

sentences.english: In any case , the match against Torino will be very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，对都灵队的比赛将会非常艰难。

sentences.english: Tuttosport has claimed that Liverpool are set to pounce for Juventus stopper Jean-Alain Boumsong.
sentences.chinese: 都灵体育报称利物浦已经为布姆松准备好了一个报价。

sentences.english: Of this literature pieces are stored in the National Library in Turin.
sentences.chinese: 这种文献的残片，现存放于都灵市的国家图书馆。

sentences.english: Lippi was brought from Napoli to Turin to aid in the turn around.
sentences.chinese: 里皮应邀从那波利来到都灵执掌教鞭。

sentences.english: An English edition of Bordeaux was published by the London firm of Dorling, Kindersely, Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的英国版由伦敦的都灵金德思出版公司出版。

sentences.english: Recoba had a good first game for Torino where he was involved in both Granata goals.
sentences.chinese: 雷科巴在都灵有了一个好的开端，参与了两个进球。

sentences.english: I myself am from Torino. You know Torino?
sentences.chinese: 我是都灵来的，你知道都灵吗？

sentences.english: I myself am from Torino. You know Torino?
sentences.chinese: 我是都灵来的，你知道都灵吗？

sentences.english: Liedholm passed away at his home in Cuccaro Monferrato in the Piedmont province of Alessandria near Turin.
sentences.chinese: 利德霍尔姆今天在都灵附近的家中去世。

sentences.english: Apart from the biancocelesti, also Torino and Roma are on Bianchi.
sentences.chinese: 除了我们，都灵和罗马也在追逐比安奇。

sentences.english: Han Pen has never stopped training before the Turin Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 韩朋在都灵奥运会之前一直没有停止过训练。

definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
